entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company founded in 1975 whose mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. They develop and support software, services, devices, and solutions that deliver new value for customers and help people and businesses realize their full potential.

entities.name: MICROSOFT 365
entities.description: Microsoft 365 is a suite that brings together Office 365, Windows, and Enterprise Mobility + Security to help organizations empower their employees with AI-backed tools that unlock creativity, increase teamwork, and fuel innovation, all the while enabling compliance coverage and data protection.

entities.name: MICROSOFT TEAMS
entities.description: Microsoft Teams is a tool within Microsoft 365 that enables rapid digital transformation by giving people a single tool to chat, call, meet, and collaborate.

entities.name: MICROSOFT VIVA
entities.description: Microsoft Viva is an employee experience platform that brings together communications, knowledge, learning, resources, and insights powered by Microsoft 365.

entities.name: MICROSOFT RELATIONSHIP SALES
entities.description: Microsoft Relationship Sales solution brings together LinkedIn Sales Navigator and Dynamics to transform business to business sales through social selling.

entities.name: DYNAMICS 365 FOR TALENT
entities.description: Dynamics 365 for Talent with LinkedIn Recruiter and Learning gives human resource professionals a complete solution to compete for talent.

entities.name: MICROSOFT POWER PLATFORM
entities.description: Microsoft Power Platform empowers employees to build custom applications, automate workflow, and analyze data no matter their technical expertise.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft 365 is a suite developed by Microsoft that integrates Office 365, Windows, and Enterprise Mobility + Security.
Microsoft Teams is a tool within the Microsoft 365 suite that enables chat, call, meet, and collaborate functions.
Microsoft Viva is an employee experience platform powered by Microsoft 365.
Microsoft Relationship Sales solution, part of Microsoft 365, brings together LinkedIn Sales Navigator and Dynamics for social selling.
Dynamics 365 for Talent, part of Microsoft 365, integrates with LinkedIn Recruiter and Learning for a complete HR solution.
Microsoft Power Platform, part of Microsoft 365, empowers employees to build applications, automate workflow, and analyze data.
